site_info.name: Органічна ферма Ліхтенфельд
site_info.description: Ukrainian organic farm producing artisan cheeses and spirits

location.address: вул. Квіткова, 7, с. Кудрявка, Березівський район, Одеська область, 67310, Україна
location.coordinates: Historical German settlement, now Ukrainian village

founder.name: Олександр Доброжанський
background: Former corporate marketing director in supermarket chains
Sniper instructor - trained nearly 100 Ukrainian snipers
founder.philosophy: Creating transparent, ecological, handmade products with love
founder.story: Moved from Odessa to rural village after military service to provide ecological environment for family and create high-quality food products

cow_cheeses.name: Ліхтенфельд
cow_cheeses.description: Classic Swiss-style aged cow's milk cheese. Recipe over 800 years old

cow_cheeses.name: Монблан
cow_cheeses.description: Alpine-style hard aged cow's milk cheese

cow_cheeses.name: Ярослав
cow_cheeses.description: Norwegian-style hard aged cow's milk cheese

cow_cheeses.name: Каберне
cow_cheeses.description: Gruyère washed twice daily in homemade Cabernet wine

cow_cheeses.name: Рамсес
cow_cheeses.description: Aged cow's milk cheese, smoked 14 days on cherry and apricot

cow_cheeses.name: Камбоцола
cow_cheeses.description: Semi-soft cow's milk cheese with multiple mold types

goat_cheeses.name: Кабралес
goat_cheeses.description: Це пліснявий сир з козиного молока, який робиться з вечірнього та вранішного молока

goat_cheeses.name: П'яна Горроча
goat_cheeses.name_english: Pyana Gorrocha (Queso de Murcia al Vino)
goat_cheeses.description: Сир Garrotxa Cabra ми готуємо з непастеризованого козиного молока... після тримісячного дозрівання сир йде на 4 тижні в довгий винне плавання

goat_cheeses.name: Гарроча
goat_cheeses.description: Сир Garrotxa ми готуємо з непастеризованого козиного молока Зааненінських та Нубійських кіз за традиційним Каталонському рецептом

goat_cheeses.name: Бебі Фумадо
goat_cheeses.description: Маленькі головки козиного сиру витримую три місяці, а потім копчу на холодному диму пару тижнів

goat_cheeses.name: Копчена Горроча
goat_cheeses.description: Цей козиний сир ми робимо з витриманної Горрочі шляхом двотижневого холодного копчення. Для диму використовуємо стружки з черешні

goat_cheeses.name: Аркоіріс
goat_cheeses.description: Аркоіріс – це козиний пліснявий сир Кабралес вимочений у вині. Аркоіріс - це райдуга смаку :)

spirits_and_drinks.name: Ван Гог
spirits_and_drinks.description: Абсент я роблю так, як його робили 200 рокі тому у Франції. Рецепт: 'Dale Pendell's Pharmako/Poeia' 1872 р.

spirits_and_drinks.name: Бурбон
spirits_and_drinks.description: Напій створений на основі дистилята з кукурудзи та ячменю в пропорції 70%-30%. Діжка 100 літрів, з білого витриманого карпатського дубу

spirits_and_drinks.name: Айвовий шнапс
spirits_and_drinks.description: Triple-distilled quince juice without added sugar or alcohol, recipe from Croatia

spirits_and_drinks.name: Джин
spirits_and_drinks.description: Made from Thomas Dakin's 1761 recipe, complex flavor with pine, citrus, herbal notes

spirits_and_drinks.name: Шнапс
spirits_and_drinks.description: Soft, aromatic drink made from homemade grain alcohol and herbs

recent_reviews.feedback: Family enjoyed the set, especially his sisters. Praised the intense flavor. Missing Lichtenfeld cheese noted.
Criticized packaging and delivery. Cheese needed over 24 hours to develop proper aroma. Eventually found the cheese tasty and intense.
Excited about cheese aromas. Described as a 'gastronomic orgasm'. Praised for gourmet quality.
Criticized Cabrales (rancid butter taste). Found Albion too salty.
Received 7/9 cheeses in set. Praised changing flavors. Appreciated craftsmanship.

press_coverage.title: С плесенью и любовью: как в самой молодой немецкой колонии Украины патриот швейцарский сыр делает
key_quotes: I decided to return to the village and build my Country, with a capital C, here in Kudryavka, with my own labor.
It's very difficult to maintain calm when returning from the front and seeing idle people with shawarma.
highlights: Dobrozhanski is a veteran who fought in Donbas
Started cheese-making in 2016 after military service
Located in Kudryavka, a young German settlement in Ukraine
Produces 8 cheese varieties, including hard and blue-veined cheeses
Uses ecological Alpine cheese protection techniques

press_coverage.author: Oksana Korol (Deputy Editor-in-Chief)
press_coverage.title: Oleksandr Dobrozhanskyy: Facebook and Instagram do not sell, my cheeses are sold by the website
key_points: Operates three cheesemaking facilities under the Lichtenfeld brand
Generates approximately 1 million UAH in annual sales
Focuses on direct sales through website
business_philosophy: The main thing for the success of a project is not to make nice and useful products, but to know how to sell them
Facebook and Instagram do not sell - the website sells. Social networks generate traffic to the site
People want to buy from people, buy from a legend!

key_details: Joined UNSO (Ukrainian Nationalist Self-Defense) in autumn 2014
Trained nearly 100 Ukrainian snipers over 2.5 years
Transformed from Russian-speaking Odesa manager to Ukrainian nationalist
After military service, returned to family in 2016
press_coverage.philosophy: On the war, I began to understand what truly has value. It's not cars and money, but family.

blog_posts.title: «Пока научился делать сыр, испортил тонну молока»: как ветеран АТО стал успешным сыроваром
blog_posts.author: Igor OSIPCHUK, 'FACTS' newspaper
key_points: Aleksandr Dobrozhanski transitioned from corporate life to cheesemaking
Learned through experimentation and Swiss farm training
Produces 8 types of cheese avoiding protected brand names
Works with local farmers offering better milk prices
Willing to teach cheesemaking to ATO veterans for free
Startup costs: 40-50,000 UAH for equipment, 50-80,000 UAH working capital
blog_posts.notable_quote: Пока научился делать сыр, испортил около тонны молока

blog_posts.title: Альфа
blog_posts.author: Олександр Доброжанський
blog_posts.topic: Farm life story about dog Alpha
blog_posts.content: Meet Alpha, a Bullmastiff weighing ~80kg. Alpha refuses fresh pork bones but waits for cheese. Daily production includes waste and rejected items - not all cheese heads earn the #Lichtenfeld honor. Such is the hard life in the village.

name_significance.origin: Original name of German settler village in the area before 20th century
name_significance.translation: Neighboring village Yasnopillia directly translates from German as 'Lichtenfeld'
name_significance.cultural_context: Located where many ethnic Germans resettled in the 1990s
name_significance.meaning: Preserving cultural heritage through food production

design_elements.style: Clean, informative design focused on showcasing artisanal products
